bibl.title: The Roman Coins of Alexandria. Quantitative Studies. I. Text. Nero, Trajan, Septimius Severus; - II. Appendices, Notes, Figures and Tables. Plates. Avec résumé en danois.
bibl.seg: Christiansen Erik, The Roman Coins of Alexandria. Quantitative Studies. I. Text. Nero, Trajan, Septimius Severus; - II. Appendices, Notes, Figures and Tables. Plates. Avec résumé en danois.
Aarhus, University Press, 1988, 8°, 311 pp.; - 179 pp. et 2 pll. dépl.

C.R. par A.M. Burnett, CR N.S., 39 (1989) pp. 349-350. - William E. Metcalf, AJA 93 (1989) pp. 487-489. - Adriano Savio, Aegyptus 68 (1988) pp. 276-279. - Alessandra Gara, Gnomon 62 (1990) pp. 753-755. - C.J. Howgego, JRS 80 (1990) pp. 231-232. - (inti), NNB 37 (1988) p. 160. - Richard Reece, NC 150 (1990) pp. 264-266. - Giovanni Maria Staffieri, SchwMbll 39 (1989) p. 56. - Soheir Bakhoum, RN VIe s., 31 (1989) pp. 269-271.
